fields.description:
The sink is used daily in your home. It is washed, cleaned and sometimes even played with. When choosing a suitable sink, it is worth considering the sufficient size of the individual sink and the number of users.

If you wash your hands in addition to your hands in the sink, the smallest in the family or pets, you should choose the most spacious sink possible. On the other hand, if just washing your hands is enough, you don't even have to be big in the sink.

In our selection, you will find washbasins that can be installed directly on top of the pool cabinet and basin basins that can be installed on the worktop of the pool cabinet. If there are several people in the same bathroom at the same time brushing their teeth, a practical double basin facilitates daily activities.

You will also find several different types of taps from us . The faucets are designed to fit perfectly with our sinks. You complete the whole with versatile sink accessories . With accessories, you give each sink the personal look it deserves.

Check out the diverse selection to find a new stylish sink for your bathroom!
fields.title: Sink for washing alone or in pairs
